header.name: chaos/preprocessor/repetition/delineate_trailing.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines an algorithm that delineates a user-specified target a specified number of times.

macro.abstract: The macro delineates its third argument the number of times specified by its first argument.

usage.param: The number of times that macro is to be repeated. Valid values range from 0 to .

The delineator to be situated between each repetition of macro. This delineator must be a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
sep()

The target that is to be repeated. This target must be either a or a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
macro(s, n)

macro.para:
This macro behaves identically to except that it inserts a leading delineator if any repetitions exist. This is illustrated by the following pseudo-code:
sep() macro(s, 0, data) sep() macro(s, 1, data) sep() ... macro(s, count - 1, data)
